languages.text: Персонаж, использующий рукопашное оружие, может отражать атаки в ближнем бою. Когда его атакует враг, также использующий рукопашное оружие, персонаж автоматически попытается одновременно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} и парировать атаку. Чем выше показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} у атакующего, тем выше шанс игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}парирование{/g} и нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Аналогично, чем выше показатели характеристик {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} атакующего, тем ему проще не дать цели уклониться и нанести урон. Вероятность парирования равна (20 + Ближний Бой цели + ее {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к парированию − (Ближний Бой атакующего + снижение парирования))% и + бонусы от превосходства в ближнем бою. Вероятность уклонения в ближнем бою равна (30 + Ловкость цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)% и зависит от возможных бонусов и штрафов к уклонению и снижению уклонения.
languages.original_text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж, использующий рукопашное оружие, может отражать атаки в ближнем бою. Когда его атакует враг, также использующий рукопашное оружие, персонаж автоматически попытается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}уклониться{/g}, а затем парировать атаку. Для парирования он совершает проверку характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}. В случае успеха он сможет отразить атаку.

Персонаж, использующий рукопашное оружие, может отражать атаки в ближнем бою. Когда его атакует враг, также использующий рукопашное оружие, персонаж автоматически попытается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}уклониться{/g}, а затем парировать атаку. Для парирования он совершает проверку характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}. В случае успеха он сможет отразить атаку.

languages.text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text:
A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge.
The parry chance is equal to <u>(20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))</u>%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}.
The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to <u>(30 + target's Agility − attacker's Perception − (attacker's Agility / 2))</u>%.

A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

languages.text: Ein Charakter mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} kann Nahkampfangriffe ablenken. Wenn er von einem Feind mit einer Nahkampfwaffe angegriffen wird, versucht der Charakter automatisch, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und ihn zu parieren. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaftswert{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} des Angreifers ist, desto größer ist die Chance, dass der Angriff nicht pariert wird und das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet. Ebenso gilt: Je höher {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Angreifers sind, desto leichter kann er dem Ziel Schaden zufügen, auch wenn es versucht, auszuweichen. Die Parieren-Chance entspricht (20 + Waffenfähigkeit des Ziels + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Parierboni{/g} − (Waffenfähigkeit des Angreifers + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}))%, plus jegliche potenzielle Boni aus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g}. Die Chance, einem Nahkampfangriff auszuweichen, entspricht (30 + Beweglichkeit des Ziels — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%, modifiziert durch eventuelle Boni oder Mali auf Ausweichen oder Ausweichen-Reduktion.
languages.original_text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text:
Ein Charakter mit einer Nahkampfwaffe kann {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} ablenken. Wenn er von einem Feind mit einer Nahkampfwaffe angegriffen wird, versucht der Charakter automatisch, dem Angriff entweder {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen{/g} oder ihn zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Zum Parieren führen Charaktere eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} durch. Verläuft diese erfolgreich, können sie den Angriff parieren.
Wenn die Ausweichen-Chance eines Charakters höher ist als ihre Parieren-Chance, versuchen sie Angriffen auszuweichen anstatt sie zu parieren.

Ein Charakter mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} kann Nahkampfangriffe ablenken. Wenn er von einem Feind mit einer Nahkampfwaffe angegriffen wird, versucht der Charakter automatisch, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und ihn zu parieren. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaftswert{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} des Angreifers ist, desto größer ist die Chance, dass der Angriff nicht pariert wird und das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet. Ebenso gilt: Je höher {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Angreifers sind, desto leichter kann er dem Ziel Schaden zufügen, auch wenn es versucht, auszuweichen. Die Parieren-Chance entspricht (20 + Waffenfertigkeit des Ziels + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Parierboni{/g} — (Waffenfertigkeit des Angreifers + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}))%, plus jegliche potenzielle Boni aus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g}. Die Chance, einem Nahkampfangriff auszuweichen, entspricht (30 + Beweglichkeit des Ziels — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%, modifiziert durch eventuelle Boni oder Mali auf Ausweichen oder Ausweichen-Reduktion.

languages.text: Équipé d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, un personnage peut dévier les attaques de mêlée. Lorsqu'il est attaqué par un ennemi équipé lui aussi d'une arme de mêlée, le personnage tente automatiquement d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et de parer l'attaque. Plus le score de la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'attaquant est élevé, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la parade de la cible, qui subira alors des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. De plus, plus la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant sont élevées, plus il aura de chances d'ignorer la tentative d'esquive de la cible. Les chances de parade sont égales à (20 + Capacité de combat de la cible + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de parade − (Capacité de combat de l'attaquant + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g})) % plus tout bonus octroyé par la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g}. Les chances d'esquives durant une attaque de mêlée sont égales à (30 + Agilité de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %, modifiées par tout bonus ou pénalité affectant l'Esquive ou la Réduction d'esquive.
languages.original_text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text: Équipé d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, un personnage peut dévier les attaques de mêlée. Lorsqu'il est attaqué par un ennemi équipé lui aussi d'une arme de mêlée, le personnage tente automatiquement d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et de parer l'attaque. Plus le score de la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'attaquant est élevé, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la parade de la cible, qui subira alors des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. De plus, plus la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant sont élevées, plus il aura de chances d'ignorer la tentative d'esquive de la cible. Les chances de parade sont égales à (20 + Capacité de combat de la cible + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de parade − (Capacité de combat de l'attaquant + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g})) % plus tout bonus octroyé par la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g}. Les chances d'esquives durant une attaque de mêlée sont égales à (30 + Agilité de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %, modifiées par tout bonus ou pénalité affectant l'Esquive ou la Réduction d'esquive.

Équipé d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, un personnage peut dévier les attaques de mêlée. Lorsqu'il est attaqué par un ennemi équipé lui aussi d'une arme de mêlée, le personnage tente automatiquement d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et de parer l'attaque. Plus le score de la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} de l'attaquant est élevé, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la parade de la cible, qui subira alors des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. De plus, plus la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant sont élevées, plus il aura de chances d'ignorer la tentative d'esquive de la cible. Les chances de parade sont égales à (20 + Compétence d'arme de la cible + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de parade − (Compétence d'arme de l'attaquant + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Réduction de parade{/g})) % plus tout bonus octroyé par la {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}supériorité en mêlée{/g}. Les chances d'esquives durant une attaque de mêlée sont égales à (30 + Agilité de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant) %, modifiées par tout bonus ou pénalité affectant l'Esquive ou la Réduction d'esquive.

languages.text: 使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的角色可以招架近战攻击。当使用近战武器的角色受到近战攻击时，会同时尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}及招架这次攻击。攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}越是高于目标的武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}，此次攻击就越容易突破目标的招架，造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。同理，攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}越高，此次攻击就越容易突破目标的闪避，命中目标。 招架的成功率为（20+（目标的武器技能+招架{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}-（攻击者的武器技能+{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}））%，如果有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}效果，还会额外加上此加值。 闪避攻击的几率为（30+目标敏捷-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%，其他与闪避、闪避减免的相关加值与减值，也会对最终招架成功率产生影响。

When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text: 使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的角色可以招架近战攻击。当使用近战武器的角色受到近战攻击时，会同时尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}及招架这次攻击。攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}越是高于目标的武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}，此次攻击就越容易突破目标的招架，造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。同理，攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}越高，此次攻击就越容易突破目标的闪避，命中目标。 招架的成功率为（20+（目标的武器技能+招架{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}-（攻击者的武器技能+{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}））%，如果有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}效果，还会额外加上此加值。 闪避攻击的几率为（30+目标敏捷-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%，其他与闪避、闪避减免的相关加值与减值，也会对最终招架成功率产生影响。

languages.original_text: A character using a melee weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to either {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} or parry the attack. To parry, characters make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic test. If successful, they will be able to parry the attack. If a character's dodge chance is higher than their parry chance, they will try to dodge attacks instead of parrying them.

languages.text: Los personajes con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} pueden bloquear los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo. Al recibir el ataque de un enemigo con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, el personaje intentará automáticamente {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} o parar el ataque. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del atacante, mayor es la posibilidad de que el objetivo no pueda parar el ataque y sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Del mismo modo, una mayor {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} facilitan que el atacante inflija daños a pesar de la esquiva del enemigo. La probabilidad de parada es igual a (20 + Habilidad de armas del objetivo + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de parada − (Habilidad de armas del atacante + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g})) %, sumando las bonificaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}superioridad cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. La probabilidad básica de esquivar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo es igual a (30 + Agilidad del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del atacante) %, modificada por bonificaciones o penalizaciones a la esquiva y la reducción de esquiva.
languages.original_text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo pueden bloquear los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Al recibir el ataque de un enemigo con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, el personaje intentará automáticamente {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque. Para parar, el personaje realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de característica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. Si la supera, para el ataque. Si la probabilidad de esquiva del personaje es mayor que la de parada, en lugar de eso intentará esquivarlo.

languages.text: 近接武器を使用するキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対してディフクレションが可能。近接武器を使用する敵からの攻撃を受けた場合、キャラクターは自動的に攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または受け流しのいずれかを試みる。アタッカーの近接攻撃がターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃ル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}数値{/g}より高ければ高いほど、攻撃が受け流されずターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う確率は高くなる。同様に、攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が高いほど、ダメージを与えやすく、ターゲットが回避できないようにしやすくなる。 受け流しが成功する確率は（20 + ターゲットの近接攻撃 + 受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}−（アタッカーの近接攻撃＋{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}））%に、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接優位{/g}に対するポテンシャルボーナスを加えたもの。 近接攻撃の回避率は、（30 + ターゲットの敏捷性 — アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}）%に、回避や回避減少へのボーナスまたはペナルティの修正を加えたものに等しい。
languages.original_text: A character using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon can deflect melee attacks. When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.

traits.locale_text: 近接武器を使用するキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対してディフクレションが可能。近接武器を使用する敵からの攻撃を受けた場合、キャラクターは自動的に攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または受け流しのいずれかを試みる。アタッカーの武器スキルがターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}数値{/g}より高ければ高いほど、攻撃が受け流されずターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う確率は高くなる。同様に、攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が高いほど、ダメージを与えやすく、ターゲットが回避できないようにしやすくなる。 受け流しが成功する確率は（20 + ターゲットの武器スキル + 受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}−（アタッカーの武器スキル＋{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}））%に、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接優位{/g}に対するポテンシャルボーナスを加えたもの。 近接攻撃の回避率は、（30 + ターゲットの敏捷性 — アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}）%に、回避や回避減少へのボーナスまたはペナルティの修正を加えたものに等しい。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş{/g} silahı kullanan bir karakter, yakın dövüş saldırılarını saptırabilir. Düşman tarafından yakın dövüş silahıyla saldırıya uğrayan karakter, kendiliğinden hem saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} hem de saldırıyı savuşturma teşebbüsünde bulunur. Saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} ne kadar yüksekse saldırının savuşturulamama ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalması olasılığı da o kadar yüksek olur. Benzer biçimde, saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} nitelikleri ne kadar yüksekse hedefin kaçınma teşebbüsüne rağmen ona hasar vermesi de o kadar kolay olur. Savuşturma olasılığı şuna eşittir: %(20 + hedefin Silah Yeteneği + savuşturma {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusları{/g} − (saldırganın Silah Yeteneği + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g})), artı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}yakın dövüş{/g} üstünlüğünden gelen her türlü potansiyel bonuslar. Bir yakın dövüş saldırısından kaçınma olasılığı şuna eşittir: %(30 + hedefin Çeviklik niteliği − saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}). Ayrıca her türlü kaçınma ve kaçınma azaltımı bonus veya ceza puanlarıyla değişikliğe uğrayabilir.

When attacked by an enemy with a melee weapon, a character will automatically try to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and parry the attack. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the higher the chance is that the attack will not be parried and the target will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Similarly, the higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to damage the target in spite of their attempt to dodge. The parry chance is equal to (20 + target's Weapon Skill + parry {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} − (attacker's Weapon Skill + {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}))%, plus any potential bonuses from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}. The chance to dodge a melee attack is equal to (30 + target's Agility − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%, modified by any dodge or dodge reduction bonuses or penalties.
